item.title: Pony.ai becomes first to win citywide robotaxi permit in China's Silicon Valley
item.description: Pony.ai said it is the first company to get a permit to operate taxis across all of the Chinese city of Shenzhen on the border of Hong Kong.

item.title: China says it’s willing to work with U.S. on TikTok — but offers few details
item.description: Beijing indicated it would work with the U.S. on addressing the future of TikTok in the country.

item.title: China's Xi urges Asian nations to keep supply chains stable, work together during ‘turbulent’ times
item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping played up how Beijing is a proponent of stable supply chains and free trade in a speech Friday.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Apple, Amazon, Coinbase, Netflix and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.

item.title: Powell forced to stave off uprisings in markets and on his own Fed board as his term ends
item.description: Powell faces if not the most difficult challenge of his time in office at least the trickiest.
